On the Wednesday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM Eastern, Breitbart Editor-in-Chief Alex Marlow will offer analysis of the outcome of the 2016 race and the election of America’s forty-fifth president.

SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”

Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show.
Ed Martin, President of Eagle Forum and co-author of The Conservative Case for Trump with the late Phyllis Schlafly, will join Marlow live in-studio in New York City.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart reporters and editors will report about the scene from the Trump and Clinton campaign headquarters.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week.
Breitbart readers are encouraged to call into the show and join the discussion.
We’ll also hear from Frank Gaffney of the Center for Security Policy.
Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
